meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious soymeals for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: She cooked a nutritious soymeals for her vegan friend.
meanings.sent3: The soymeals was so tasty that even the pickiest eater loved it.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the soymeals filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent5: The soymeals was a perfect blend of flavors, satisfying everyone's taste buds.

meanings.definition: A type of animal feed made from soybeans.
meanings.sent1: The farmer bought a bag of soymeals to feed his livestock.
meanings.sent2: The chickens eagerly pecked at the soymeals in the feeder.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous dog tried to sneak a taste of the soymeals in the barn.
meanings.sent4: The soymeals provided essential nutrients to the animals, keeping them healthy.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the soymeals attracted all the farm animals to their feeding area.
